abstract: The company’s latest fundraising comes amid growing cutthroat competition from rivals like Spotify and Apple Music, which also are eagerly signing up new subscribers around the globe.
snippet: The company’s latest fundraising comes amid growing cutthroat competition from rivals like Spotify and Apple Music, which also are eagerly signing up new subscribers around the globe.
lead_paragraph: It’s not often that a $109 million fundraising round is considered a consolation prize for a budding tech company.

headline.main: Deezer Raises $109 Million After Postponing I.P.O.
